original_title: SJB will support genuine efforts to revive the economic crisis
original_body_lines: Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) will support effective and genuine efforts to revive the economic crisis, it's General Secretary Ranjith Madduma Bandara said today.

Madduma Bandara told a media conference that his party would support effective and genuine efforts to revive the nation but ruled out anticipated crossovers from SJB to the government. “Crossovers will be in the other direction,” he added.

The SJB General Secretary asked as to why the government had failed to bring in an anti-corruption bill despite the assurances given by the government that the best anti-corruption Bill will be brought in soon. “We wonder as to why the government had failed to bring in an anti-corruption Bill as we are ready to support an effective piece of legislation of that nature,” he said.

Also, he questioned the fate of 100 files on corrupt persons. “We also wonder on the government stand on the private member's Bill which I have presented to Parliament,” he said in this regard.(Yohan Perera)
